--- alter_table_alter_column_alter_identity_set_skip_range.sql
ALTER TABLE actions ALTER COLUMN id ALTER IDENTITY SET SKIP RANGE 1, 1234567
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 19,
        Name:    "actions",
      },
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.AlterColumn{
    Alter: 20,
    Name:  &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 33,
      NameEnd: 35,
      Name:    "id",
    },
    Alteration: &ast.AlterColumnAlterIdentity{
      Alter:      36,
      Alteration: &ast.SetSkipRange{
        Set:       51,
        SkipRange: &ast.SequenceParamSkipRange{
          Skip: 55,
          Min:  &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 66,
            ValueEnd: 67,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1",
          },
          Max: &ast.IntLiteral{
            ValuePos: 69,
            ValueEnd: 76,
            Base:     10,
            Value:    "1234567",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE actions ALTER COLUMN id ALTER IDENTITY SET SKIP RANGE 1, 1234567
